name: The Food by Kuali Emak
features: Popular for steamboat and seafood dishes; a favorite spot for dinner among locals.
address: Jln I-MAS Village, 94300 Kota Samarahan, Sarawak

name: Oten's @ Rasa Indah Kafeteria
features: Offers generous portions at affordable prices; ample parking space available.
address: Jalan Datuk Mohammad Musa, Kota Samarahan, Sarawak

name: Secret Recipe Café & Restaurant
features: Renowned for its cakes and a variety of Asian and Western dishes; located within The Summer Mall.
address: G35 & G90, Lot 1396–1403 & Lot 108, The Summer Shopping Mall, Jalan Dato Mohd Musa, Kota Samarahan, Sarawak

name: Rumah Asap Dayak
features: Showcases traditional Dayak cuisine, including BBQ and pansuh dishes; features multiple stalls with various specialties

name: G Coffee @ Desa Ilmu
features: Known for its large-sized drinks, especially the popular green tea flavor; a cozy spot for beverages.
address: 86, Lor Desa Ilmu 22A, 94300 Kota Samarahan, Sarawak

name: Verano Food Court @ Summer Mall
features: Specializes in flavorful tomyam soup; a go-to place for spicy food enthusiasts.

name: Restoran Dulang Kampung
features: Offers traditional Malay dishes in a rustic setting; known for its authentic kampung-style meals.
address: Ground Floor, SL 52 & 53 PH15, Jln Desa Ilmu, 94300 Kota Samarahan, Sarawak

name: D’Dayak Cafe Deligh
features: Serves a variety of Dayak and local Malaysian dishes; appreciated for its cultural ambiance.
address: Ground Floor, LOT 3688, Medan Universiti, Kota Samarahan (Link), 94300 Kota Samarahan, Sarawak

name: Pohonmas Café & Restaurant
features: Offers a variety of local Malaysian dishes in a cozy café setting
address: Ground Floor L3022 SL16, Jalan Datuk Mohammad Musa, Kota Samarahan, Sarawak

name: Pinang Bistro Restaurant
features: Serves a range of Malaysian dishes, including nasi lemak and grilled fish, in a casual dining environment.
address: Ground Floor, Uni Square 10 & 11, Kuching-Kota Samarahan Expressway, Kota Samarahan, Sarawak
